content: With the Yaksha King defeated, Zhu Bajie will get him to spit out the relic. Chapter 5 comes to an end with Rakshasi appearing and promising to never leave the mountain again, and handing over the Plantain Fan to the Destined One.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Field_of_Fire_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Field of Fire Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Fallen Furnace Crater' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai King - Yaksha King'.
The content is as follows:
With the Yaksha King defeated, Zhu Bajie will get him to spit out the relic. Chapter 5 comes to an end with Rakshasi appearing and promising to never leave the mountain again, and handing over the Plantain Fan to the Destined One.
